name: Super Slalom
description:
UP! UP! DOWN! DOWN! LEFT! RIGHT! LEFT! RIGHT! SKI! A! START!

Choose from three (or more...? ;) hehehe) difficulties and ride down the slopes in order to get the highest score possible before you inevitably crash and need to call ski patrol. Super Slalom is a skiing game within the endless runner genre.

Inspired by the build of Alpine Skiing shown by the NYU Game Center, and recreated from scratch, Super Slalom aims to be a more polished and well-rounded experience.
